<% if(v_ch1_show_yourself == 1) {%>"I'm going to give you until the count of ten to get out of my sight," I tell him.
"Hah! Empty words. That's all you've got. Arm yourself, fool! Today, I become a legend!"

Once he's done talking, I hear the mage throw several knives towards the forest. I desperately try to pull the knife out of my shoulder, but it's no use. Five of the mage's knives race past me, and turn in midair just like the last one did. I try to somehow get out of their way, but the knife in my shoulder is still keeping me pinned against the tree.

The last thing I feel is the sharp pain of all those knives impaling me, as my consciousness slowly starts fading away.

"Hah! Empty words. That's all you've got. Arm yourself, fool! Today, I become a legend!"

Once he's done talking, the mage throws five daggers simultaneously towards me. I try to dodge them but they're so fast I barely even get the time to blink. It was all over in an instant. As I feel the pain from the daggers, my consciousness slowly starts fading away.

"Hah! Empty words. That's all you've got. Arm yourself, fool! Today, I become a legend!"

Once he's done talking, I hear the mage throw several knives towards the forest. They all race past me, but before I get the chance to even think what to do next, the knives suddenly turn in midair and fly towards me, impaling me where I stand. It all ended so fast I barely even had the time to realize I was dead.
